subject: NIGERIA NATIONAL ASSEMBLY
body:
NIGERIA NATIONAL ASSEMBLY
FEDERAL CAPITAL TERRITORY
ABUJA, NIGERIA.
Dear Honorable Beneficiary
EFFORTS TO RELEASE YOUR ACCRUED INTEREST VALUED US$950,000,00
This is to officially inform you that the sum of $950,000, 00(Nine
hundred and fifty thousand dollars) has been accrued as interest on
your contract sum that was deposited into our bank by the Federal
Government of Nigeria.
You are therefore advised to forward your bank details including your
means of identification and direct telephone numbers. We would
appreciate your urgent response regarding the above information, as
this will enable our bank to treat this matter with Urgency.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Yours faithfully,
Sen. Uba Sani
Senate Committee on Foreign Contract And Payment
Email: 
senatorubasani@legislator.com

subject: Re:   NIGERIA NATIONAL ASSEMBLY
body:
Hello Sen. Uba Sani,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the accrued interest on a contract sum. I must admit, I don't recall having any contracts with the Federal Government of Nigeria.

Could you please provide more details about this contract? When was it initiated and what was its purpose? Also, how did my name get associated with it?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Charles
